Posts.Content: Oct 7, 2011 09:47AM loveb wrote: I know many hospitals have programs for free mammograms for women who are un or under insured. Perhaps you could do the leg work for her and contact the breast treatment centers in her town and see if they have a similar program that she could utilitze. If they do and she qualifies then she wouldn't have to have the financial worries.  Just a thought.  :) And I'm really sorry about your friend. I lost my Mom to breast cancer a little over a year ago. It really is diffiuclt and I wish you didn't have the pain of losing your friend. I'm sending warm thoughts and hugs your way Lynn! I wish there was more I could do.  *hugs*
Posts.Title: helping a friend mamadog53 loveb
